attributes.action: Women should be treated equally, and listened to by the medical world
attributes.additional_details: Many ladies visit the doctors each day with pain and problems, are the ladies listened to? Are the doctors actually getting to the root of the problem.Questions doctors should be asking,Is the lady on birth control,implants or sterilised,or does the lady have any medical implants,this could then send the lady to the correct specialist to help them. Most of the time ladies are led to believe that the pain is either in there heads? Not real, or they are being hysterical
attributes.background: Lets create a traffic light system for ladies, so that the pain is investigated correctly and the ladies are sent in the right direction for treatment and help, at the moment ladies are left for years not knowing what is wrong.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Treatment decisions are a clincial matter for the NHS and not for the UK Government or Parliament.
